name: Caerphilly Castle
description: placeholder for now placeholder for now placeholder for now placeholder for now placeholder for now placeholder for now placeholder for now placeholder for now

reviews.author: Alice Johnson
reviews.text: Absolutely stunning grounds and amazing guided tour. A must-see!

reviews.author: Michael Smith
reviews.text: Great history lesson, though the gift shop is a bit pricey.

reviews.author: Priya Patel
reviews.text: Beautiful architecture, but it gets very crowded on weekends.

reviews.author: Liam O’Connor
reviews.text: Loved the panoramic views from the tower—worth the climb!

reviews.author: Sofia García
reviews.text: Nice site but the cafe was closed when I visited—plan ahead.
